00041 bool
00042 BscLexer::Lex( const char *text, unsigned char eos )
00043 {
00045         _tokenStream.clear();
00046         _errors.clear();
00047 
00048         unsigned int lineNum = 1;
00049 
00051         unsigned int chIndex = 0;
00052         unsigned char ch = text[ chIndex ];
00053         if ( ch == eos )
00054         {
00056                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_EOS, "", 0 ) );
00057                 return true;
00058         }
00059 
00061         unsigned char la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00062 
00064         while ( ch != eos )
00065         {
00066                 switch ( ch )
00067                 {
00068                 case '"':
00069                         {
00070                                 ++chIndex;
00071                                 ch = la;
00072                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00073                                 tstring str;
00074                                 while ( ch != '"' && ch != eos )
00075                                 {
00076                                         str += ch;
00077 
00078                                         ++chIndex;
00079                                         ch = la;
00080                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00081                                 }
00082                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_STRING, str, lineNum ) );
00083                         }
00084                         break;
00085 
00086                 case '\'':
00087                         {
00088                                 ++chIndex;
00089                                 ch = la;
00090                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00091                                 char buf[ 5 ] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00092                                 unsigned int i = 0;
00093                                 while ( ch != '\'' && i < 4 && ch != eos )
00094                                 {
00095                                         buf[ i ] = ch;
00096 
00097                                         ++chIndex;
00098                                         ch = la;
00099                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00100                         
00101                                         ++i;
00102                                 }
00103                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_CHAR, buf, lineNum ) );
00104                         }
00105                         break;
00106 
00107 
00108                 case '+':
00109                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_PLUS, "+", lineNum ) );
00110                         break;
00111 
00112                 case '-':
00113                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_MINUS, "-", lineNum ) );
00114                         break;
00115 
00116                 case '*':
00117                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_ASTERISK, "*", lineNum ) );
00118                         break;
00119 
00120                 case '/':
00121                         if ( la == '/' )
00122                         {
00124                                 while ( ch != '\n' )
00125                                 {
00126                                         ++chIndex;
00127                                         ch = la;
00128                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00129                                         if ( la == eos )
00130                                                 break;
00131                                 }
00132 
00134                                 continue;
00135                         }
00136                         else if ( la == '*' )
00137                         {
00139                                 chIndex += 2;
00140                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00141                                 if ( ch != eos )
00142                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00143 
00145                                 while ( ( ch != '*' || la != '/' ) && ch != eos )
00146                                 {
00147                                         if ( ch == '\n' )
00148                                                 ++lineNum;
00149 
00150                                         ++chIndex;
00151                                         ch = la;
00152                                         if ( ch != eos )
00153                                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00154                                 }
00155 
00157                                 if ( ch != eos )
00158                                 {
00159                                         chIndex += 2;
00160                                         ch = text[ chIndex ];
00161                                         if ( ch != eos )
00162                                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00163                                 }
00164 
00166                                 continue;
00167                         }
00168                         else
00169                         {
00170                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_SLASH, "/", lineNum ) );
00171                         }
00172                         break;
00173 
00174                 case '%':
00175                         if ( la == '%' )
00176                         {
00179                                 chIndex += 2;
00180                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00181                                 if ( ch != eos )
00182                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00183 
00185                                 tstring str;
00186                                 while ( ( ch != '%' || la != '%' ) && ch != eos )
00187                                 {
00188                                         str += ch;
00189                                         ++chIndex;
00190                                         ch = la;
00191                                         if ( ch != eos )
00192                                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00193                                 }
00194 
00196                                 if ( ch != eos )
00197                                 {
00198                                         chIndex += 2;
00199                                         ch = text[ chIndex ];
00200                                         if ( ch != eos )
00201                                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00202                                 }
00203 
00205                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_STRING, str, lineNum ) );
00206 
00208                                 continue;
00209                         }
00210                         else
00211                         {
00212                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_PERCENT, "%", lineNum ) );
00213                         }
00214                         break;
00215 
00216 
00217                 case '[':
00218                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LSQUAREBRACE, "[ ", lineNum ) );
00219                         break;
00220 
00221                 case ']':
00222                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_RSQUAREBRACE, " ]", lineNum ) );
00223                         break;
00224 
00225                 case '(':
00226                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LPAREN, "(", lineNum ) );
00227                         break;
00228 
00229                 case ')':
00230                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_RPAREN, ")", lineNum ) );
00231                         break;
00232 
00233                 case '{':
00234                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LBRACE, "{", lineNum ) );
00235                         break;
00236 
00237                 case '}':
00238                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_RBRACE, "}", lineNum ) );
00239                         break;
00240 
00241 
00242                 case '<':
00243                         if ( la == '=' )
00244                         {
00246                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LESSEQUAL, "<=", lineNum ) );
00247                                 chIndex += 2;
00248                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00249                                 if ( ch != eos )
00250                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00251                                 continue;
00252                         }
00253                         else
00254                         {
00255                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LESS, "<", lineNum ) );
00256                         }
00257                         break;
00258 
00259                 case '>':
00260                         if ( la == '=' )
00261                         {
00263                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_GREATEREQUAL, ">=", lineNum ) );
00264                                 chIndex += 2;
00265                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00266                                 if ( ch != eos )
00267                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00268                                 continue;
00269                         }
00270                         else
00271                         {
00272                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_GREATER, ">", lineNum ) );
00273                         }
00274                         break;
00275 
00276                 case '!':
00277                         if ( la == '=' )
00278                         {
00280                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_NOTEQUAL, "!=", lineNum ) );
00281                                 chIndex += 2;
00282                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00283                                 if ( ch != eos )
00284                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00285                                 continue;
00286                         }
00287                         else
00288                         {
00289                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_NOT, "!", lineNum ) );
00290                         }
00291                         break;
00292 
00293                 case '=':
00294                         if ( la == '=' )
00295                         {
00297                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_ISEQUAL, "==", lineNum ) );
00298                                 chIndex += 2;
00299                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00300                                 if ( ch != eos )
00301                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00302                                 continue;
00303                         }
00304                         else
00305                         {
00306                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_EQUALS, "=", lineNum ) );
00307                         }
00308                         break;
00309 
00310                 case '&':
00311                         if ( la == '&' )
00312                         {
00314                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LOGICALAND, "&&", lineNum ) );
00315                                 chIndex += 2;
00316                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00317                                 if ( ch != eos )
00318                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00319                                 continue;
00320                         }
00321                         else
00322                         {
00323                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_AND, "&", lineNum ) );
00324                         }
00325                         break;
00326 
00327                 case '|':
00328                         if ( la == '|' )
00329                         {
00331                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_LOGICALOR, "||", lineNum ) );
00332                                 chIndex += 2;
00333                                 ch = text[ chIndex ];
00334                                 if ( ch != eos )
00335                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00336                                 continue;
00337                         }
00338                         else
00339                         {
00340                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_OR, "|", lineNum ) );
00341                         }
00342                         break;
00343 
00344                 case ',':
00345                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_COMMA, ",", lineNum ) );
00346                         break;
00347 
00348                 case ';':
00349                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_SEMICOLON, ";", lineNum ) );
00350                         break;
00351 
00352                 case ':':
00353                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_COLON, ":", lineNum ) );
00354                         break;
00355 
00356                 case '.':
00357                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_PERIOD, ".", lineNum ) );
00358                         break;
00359 
00360 
00361                 case '\n':
00363                         ++lineNum;
00364                 case ' ':
00365                 case '\r':
00366                 case '\t':
00368                         break;
00369 
00370                 default:
00371                         {
00372                                 tstring str;
00373 
00375                                 if ( isalpha( ch ) || ch == '_' || ch == '\\' )
00376                                 {
00377                                         while ( ( isalnum( ch ) || ch == '_' || ch == '\\' || ch == '/' || ch == '.' || ch == ':' ) && ch != eos )
00378                                         {
00383                                                 str += ch;
00384 
00386                                                 ++chIndex;
00387                                                 ch = la;
00388                                                 if ( ch != eos )
00389                                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00390                                         }
00391                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_IDENTIFIER, str, lineNum ) );
00392                                 }
00393                                 else if ( isdigit( ch ) )
00394                                 {
00395                                         while ( ( isalnum( ch ) || ch == '.' ) && ch != eos )
00396                                         {
00401                                                 str += ch;
00402 
00404                                                 ++chIndex;
00405                                                 ch = la;
00406                                                 if ( ch != eos )
00407                                                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00408                                         }
00409                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_NUMBER, str, lineNum ) );
00410                                 }
00411                                 else
00412                                 {
00413 //                                      B_ASSERT( false );
00414                                         ++chIndex;
00415                                         ch = la;
00416                                         if ( ch != eos )
00417                                                 la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00418                                 }
00419                                 continue;
00420                         }
00421                         break;
00422 
00423                 };
00424                 ++chIndex;
00425                 ch = la;
00426                 if ( ch != eos )
00427                         la = text[ chIndex + 1 ];
00428         }
00429 
00431         _tokenStream.push_back( SBscToken( BL_EOS, "", lineNum ) );
00432 
00434         return( _errors.size() == 0 );
00435 }
